issue.title: FixPart.* - Broken (AdGuard Cookie Notices filter)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.52.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://fixpart.at/ https://fixpart.be/ https://fixpart.ch/ https://fixpart.co.uk/ https://fixpart.cz/ https://fixpart.de/ https://fixpart.es/ https://fixpart.fi/ https://fixpart.fr/ https://fixpart.hu/ https://fixpart.ie/ https://fixpart.it/ https://fixpart.lu/ https://fixpart.nl/ https://fixpart.no/ https://fixpart.ro/ https://fixpart.se/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected sites:
```
https://fixpart.at/
https://fixpart.be/
https://fixpart.ch/
https://fixpart.co.uk/
https://fixpart.cz/
https://fixpart.de/
https://fixpart.es/
https://fixpart.fi/
https://fixpart.fr/
https://fixpart.hu/
https://fixpart.ie/
https://fixpart.it/
https://fixpart.lu/
https://fixpart.nl/
https://fixpart.no/
https://fixpart.ro/
https://fixpart.se/
```
### Issue:
Modal overlay and empty/unclickable popup, due to a partially blocked cookie consent!

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Cookie Notices filter**

### Problem rule:
`##.cookiebar:not(body)`

### Possible fix:
`fixpart.*##.fp-cookie-modal`

### Other problem filters:
* **EasyList - Cookie Notices** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/17478/
`##.cookiebar:not(body):not(html)`

* **Frellwit's Swedish Filter**
`##div.cookiebar`

* **I don't care about cookies** _(NOTIFIED)_
`~spilger.de##.cookiebar:not(body):not(html):not(button):not(#page):not(.content-section)`

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v118.0.1-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.52.2

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
